text: Reminder: If you had a magic wand and could have any feature in HubSpot what would it be? Post your idea to the idea forum, then link to it from here so folks can help upvote your idea. Upvotes help HubSpotters quantify demand for functionality and influence our prioritization.

Not a dev problem but an ops problem that plagues me :sob:

<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Multi-select-forms-or-ability-to-use-CONTAINS-in-workflow-or/idi-p/426424>
<@U0177RKAS1H> agree. Which is really hard to accept since the main goal of the platform is content marketing.
<@UBT0AHWLD> This was what I was thinking as well so thank you for reconfirming this as a possible solution and posting that resource.
